name: Just another cosmic morning!
description:
All independent beings need a morning routine. Get your morning beverage and pet your capybara! Well, once you figure out how anyways.

Use arrow keys to move the character.

Click on objects to get hints if you get stuck.

This games was created for https://itch.io/jam/major-jam-4-cosmic! Note that the limitation was "The player must CHEAT". Do with that info what you will!
